1) January : Memecoin Craze

$HYPE  founder is taking a bold stand in crypto: a hardline ethos of no insiders, no preferential treatment, no market maker deals. ğŸ§  In a space often criticized for opaque launches and privileged access, this approach is about fairness and building trust from day one.  By committing to a truly level playing field, Hyperliquid is signaling that long-term credibility matters more than short-term hype. This could reshape how DeFi projects approach fundraising and community building.   Itâ€™s a reminder that in crypto, transparency and principle can be just as powerful as technology. Watching how this unfolds will be fascinating for investors and enthusiasts alike. ğŸ‘€        #DeFi  #Crypto  #Hyperliquid
